Module com.webfirmframework.wffweb
Package com.webfirmframework.wffweb.server.page

Interface BrowserPageSession

public sealed interface BrowserPageSession
There will be one BrowserPageSession object per httpSessionId
Since:
12.0.0-beta.4

  • Method Details

    • id

      String id()
      Returns:
      the http session id

    • userProperties

      Map<String,Object> userProperties()
      The saved object will be prevented from being garbage collected so manually remove it after use. The return map is thread-safe and atomic operations can be performed with it.
      Returns:
      the map to save user properties
      Since:
      12.0.0-beta.4

    • localStorage

      LocalStorage localStorage()

    • setWeakProperty

      Object setWeakProperty(String key, Object property)
      Note: This will not prevent the saved object from being garbage collected. This is a thread-safe method.
      Parameters:
      key - the key
      property - the value object
      Returns:
      the previously associated object.
      Since:
      12.0.0-beta.4

    • getWeakProperty

      Object getWeakProperty(String key)
      This is a thread-safe method.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to get the saved property
      Returns:
      the property if exists otherwise null. It will also return null if the saved object is garbage collected.
      Since:
      12.0.0-beta.4

    • removeWeakProperty

      Object removeWeakProperty(String key)
      This is a thread-safe method.
      Parameters:
      key -
      Returns:
      the previously associated object or null no mapping found. It will also return null if the saved object is garbage collected.
      Since:
      12.0.0-beta.4
